metrics_conclusion: Hero has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Hero is written in the key of B Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 6th most popular key among Minor keys and     the 14th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (B minor, E minor, and Fâ™¯ minor).
